title: Chink in the Armor
story: The sun's golden rays, unhindered by storm or mist, reveal unexpected weaknesses in the castle's ancient, dark magic. A fleeting opportunity to strike!
effect: During this Day phase, all heroes gain +1 to their D6 combat rolls when attacking any Vampire Sister. However, if a hero successfully hits a Sister, they must immediately lose 1 Sanity, their minds reeling from the confrontation.
